explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper uses cluster analysis to group products with similar help desk incident characteristics, which is a technique in unsupervised learning.
explanations.clustering: Cluster analysis is explicitly mentioned as a method to group similarly behaving products into clusters.
explanations.principal components analysis: Principal Components Analysis (PCA) is used to determine one representative product per cluster for incident prediction.
explanations.regression: Linear regression is used with cost data to relate incident predictions to help desk labor costs.
